1.name: Manufacturer/Distributor
1.description: This field contains the identity of the manufacturer/distributor
1.data_type: XON - Extended Composite Name And ID For Organizations

10.name: Marketing Basis
10.description: This field contains the basis for marketing approval. Refer to HL7 table 0330 - Marketing basis for valid values
10.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

11.name: Marketing Approval Identifier
11.description: This field contains the designation or description of the marketing basis

12.name: Labeled Shelf Life
12.description: This field contains the shelf life of the product as labeled. This will usually be in months or years. If there is no shelf life indicated in the product labeling, this field will be empty

13.name: Expected Shelf Life
13.description: This field contains the shelf life of the product expected by the manufacturer. This will usually be in months or years

14.name: Date First Marked
14.description: This field contains the date the product was first marketed in the country

15.name: Date Last Marked
15.description: This field contains the date the product was last marketed in the country. This field will be omitted if the product is still being marketed

2.name: Country
2.description: This field contains the country to which this product detail is relevant. ISO 3166 provides a list of country codes that may be used

3.name: Brand Name
3.description: This field contains the name under which the product is marketed by this manufacturer

4.name: Device Family Name
4.description: This field contains the name used by the manufacturer to describe the family of products to which this product belongs

5.name: Generic Name
5.description: This field contains the name generically used to identify the product

6.name: Model Identifier
6.description: This field contains the manufacturer’s model identifier for the product

7.name: Catalogue Identifier
7.description: This field contains the manufacturer’s catalogue identifier for the product

8.name: Other Identifier
8.description: This field contains any other identifier used to for the product

9.name: Product Code
9.description: This field contains the product code from an external coding system such as that used by the CDRH at the FDA
